channel.title: CVE Feed for Brother Industries, Ltd. -- iPrint&Scan Desktop for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brother Industries, Ltd. -- iPrint&Scan Desktop for Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-51654|2024-08-02T22:40:33.847Z -- brother%20industries%2C%20ltd. -- iprint%26scan%20desktop%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper link resolution before file access ('Link Following') issue exists in iPrint&Scan Desktop for Windows versions 11.0.0 and earlier. A symlink attack by a malicious user may cause a Denial-of-service (DoS) condition on the PC.
